attributes.action: Make fireworks silent to avoid distressing animals.
attributes.additional_details: It's not just our pets that suffer. Many more people are having the same issue and this is why I am starting this petition.
attributes.background: I've got two dogs who both get very stressed at this time of the year due to the loud bangs from fireworks. From neighbours having firework nights to big events, it's constant until after the new year. Silent fireworks are available so why can't they be standard and enforced to avoid this cruelty?
